properties.entry: SELECT submittedUrl FROM jobs_feed WHERE posted_to_gfj = 1 AND is_deleted=0 AND (posted_date BETWEEN '2022-11-08 00:00:00' AND '2022-11-08 23:59:59') GROUP BY company
SELECT uniqueid FROM jobs_feed WHERE posted_to_gfj ! = 1 AND is_deleted=0 AND (posted_date BETWEEN '2022-11-08 00:00:00' AND '2022-11-08 23:59:59') GROUP BY company LIMIT 2
SELECT submittedUrl FROM jobs_feed WHERE posted_to_gfj = 1 AND is_deleted=0 AND (posted_date BETWEEN '2022-11-05 00:00:00' AND '2022-11-05 23:59:59') GROUP BY company LIMIT 2
SELECT uniqueid FROM jobs_feed WHERE posted_to_gfj = 10 AND is_deleted=0 AND (posted_date BETWEEN '2022-11-05 00:00:00' AND '2022-11-05 23:59:59') GROUP BY company LIMIT 2
SELECT submittedUrl FROM jobs_feed WHERE posted_to_gfj = 1 AND is_deleted=0 AND (posted_date BETWEEN '2022-11-05 00:00:00' AND '2022-11-05 23:59:59') GROUP BY company LIMIT 2
SELECT uniqueid FROM jobs_feed WHERE posted_to_gfj = 10 AND is_deleted=0 AND (posted_date BETWEEN '2022-11-05 00:00:00' AND '2022-11-05 23:59:59') GROUP BY company LIMIT 2
